long_desc.thetext:
Tracker for async updates for rawhide and other fedora distribution.
As golang devel packages are used only as a build-time dependency at the moment, this tracker keeps updates and other information about this package, e.g. broken dependencies, exceptions, important pieces of information and other issues.
golang-github-vishvananda-netns-0-0.4.git5478c06.fc22 has been submitted as an update for Fedora 22. https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/golang-github-vishvananda-netns-0-0.4.git5478c06.fc22
golang-github-vishvananda-netns-0-0.4.git5478c06.fc21 has been submitted as an update for Fedora 21. https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/golang-github-vishvananda-netns-0-0.4.git5478c06.fc21
golang-github-vishvananda-netns-0-0.4.git5478c06.el6 has been submitted as an update for Fedora EPEL 6. https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/golang-github-vishvananda-netns-0-0.4.git5478c06.el6

Package golang-github-vishvananda-netns-0-0.4.git5478c06.el6: * should fix your issue, * was pushed to the Fedora EPEL 6 testing repository, * should be available at your local mirror within two days. Update it with: # su -c 'yum update --enablerepo=epel-testing golang-github-vishvananda-netns-0-0.4.git5478c06.el6' as soon as you are able to. Please go to the following url: https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2015-7413/golang-github-vishvananda-netns-0-0.4.git5478c06.el6 then log in and leave karma (feedback).
golang-github-vishvananda-netns-0-0.4.git5478c06.el6 has been pushed to the Fedora EPEL 6 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.

You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2015-7813
